<p>London is the capital and largest city of England and of the United Kingdom. Standing on the River Thames in the south-east of England, at the head of its 50-mile (80 km) estuary leading to the North Sea, London has been a major settlement for two millennia. Londinium was founded by the Romans. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=london">Text from Wikipedia</a></p>
